cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.metrics import r2_score
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Separate target variable
y = train_df['SalePrice']
X = train_df.drop(columns=['Id', 'SalePrice'])

# Combine train and test sets to handle NaN values together
combined_df = pd.concat([X, test_df], ignore_index=True)

# Fill missing values
combined_df.fillna(combined_df.mean(), inplace=True)

# Encode categorical variables
categorical_features = ['MSSubClass', 'MSZoning', 'Street', 'LotShape', 'LandContour', 'Utilities', 'LotConfig', 'LandSlope', 'Neighborhood', 'Condition1', 'Condition2', 'BldgType', 'HouseStyle', 'RoofStyle', 'RoofMatl', 'Exterior1st', 'Exterior2nd', 'MasVnrType', 'ExterQual', 'ExterCond', 'Foundation', 'BsmtQual', 'BsmtCond', 'BsmtExposure', 'BsmtFinType1', 'BsmtFinType2', 'Heating', 'HeatingQC', 'CentralAir', 'Electrical', 'GarageType', 'GarageFinish', 'GarageQual', 'GarageCond', 'PavedDrive', 'Fence', 'MiscFeature']
preprocessor = ColumnTransformer(
    transformers=[
        ('num', StandardScaler(), combined_df.select_dtypes(include=['int64', 'float64']).columns),
        ('cat', OneHotEncoder(handle_unknown='ignore'), categorical_features)
    ])

# Create pipeline
pipeline = Pipeline(steps=[('preprocessor', preprocessor),
                           ('regressor', LinearRegression())])

# Split combined dataset back into train and test
X_train = combined_df.iloc[:len(X)]
X_test = combined_df.iloc[len(X):]

# Train model
pipeline.fit(X_train, y)

# Predict on test set
predictions = pipeline.predict(X_test)

# Prepare submission dataframe
submission_df = pd.DataFrame({'Id': test_df['Id'], 'SalePrice': predic
